data.text:
@ChemistRenegade @MurphDugan @politicalplayer BS 
COVID is airborne. (It is transmitted through the air)
You are a MORON !!!
https://t.co/qOyGkyZkYp

@SandleDavid @MurphDugan @politicalplayer Nothing is precluding local governments from reimplementing mask mandates depending on the community. My community has a 2.5 percent positivity. It makes little sense to act like we are in an area with 30 percent positivity.

@SandleDavid @MurphDugan @politicalplayer People were wearing masks that were useless in the face of a more transmissible variant. You donâ€™t seem to have much sense so I will state this slowly: the mask mandates were only recently lifted and CDC guidance depends on community viral loads. How is he causing a surge?

@ChemistRenegade @MurphDugan @politicalplayer Drumpf handled it horribly from the start, CDC handled it wrong from the start and Biden handled it wrong at least since he first lifted mask mandates, but really the entire time. You'll see in April if your team blue shades are keeping you from it now.~600k have died under Biden

@SandleDavid @MurphDugan @politicalplayer That did not cause further death. What did was Drumpf allowing the virus to spread out of control and lying about it. Also, R governors like DeSantis poisoning the minds of their constituents and with no controls. Finally, I blame the half-wits who refused to take the vaccine.

@ChemistRenegade @MurphDugan @politicalplayer the CDC and Biden telling people it was fine to take their masks off and go out to restaurants and bars killed hundreds of thousands of people and will kill many more, why not shame them ?

@MurphDugan @politicalplayer Tip-toeing around this issue and patting their heads and hands to coax them is how we got in this damn mess with people remaining unvaxxed. We have been held prisoner by these folks for nearly a year since the vaccines have been available. I am done.
